mapper.select: SELECT tnm.NOTICE_ID noticeId, tnm.SUBJECT subject, tnm.CREATE_DE createDe, tni.IMG_URL imgUrl FROM tb_notice_main tnm INNER JOIN tb_notice_img tni ON tnm.NOTICE_ID = tni.NOTICE_ID AND tni.REPRESENT = true WHERE tnm.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY tnm.CREATE_DE DESC LIMIT ${param.offset}, ${param.max};
